name: The haunting of Rotavele hotel
description:
This level is a submission for GDKO jam. [Location: Elevator]

Description:

Being a very talented private detective, Protagonist was invited in the hotel to resolve some mystery. Protagonist was trying her best skills but was left clueless. She was about to give up, when she found a translated description of some ritual...

Controls:

WASD 

E - Open/Close elevator doors 

1,2,3,4... - change floor. Floor can be changed only inside the elevator, when doors are closed. When something goes wrong, environment shakes and the lights flicker.

R - restarts the level.

The goal of this level is to follow the clues and solve puzzles in order to get back from the twisted parallel world where elevator brought you in the beginning.

There is no notification of level completed and colliders are not everywhere, so use R if stuck. 

The only mechanics that is working is solving a puzzle. If all puzzles are solved, the  exit will look like this:

The goal of this project is a level showcase, so controls might feel a bit wonky ;P

Thank you for playing, feel free to leave a feedback!
